[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:时间戳工具V2.0_20200810]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rumors (feat. Lil Durk) (Explicit) - Gucci Mane/Lil Durk
[00:00.15]Tay Keith f**k these n***as up 
[00:02.07]
[00:03.24]DJ Meech lil' b***h 
[00:04.41]
[00:11.91]Them n***as get on y'all a*s y'all play with me like I ain't worse 
[00:14.73]Tryna gossip up the blogs like y'all ain't said my name first 
[00:17.85]He a junkie he ain't shot his gun yet he blame percs 
[00:20.82]Shot a video and had a shootout in the same shirt 
[00:23.79]What you know about popping out and trying to hit they face first 
[00:26.85]They like Smurk your a*s be tripping better put your case first 
[00:29.70]Choking who 
[00:30.42]I heard them rumors n***as better play slow 
[00:32.67]I don't want no n***as who you catch I want the one I paid for 
[00:35.67]We on his a*s he in the A you see how long they stay for 
[00:38.79]Ain't no hotel room we pop outside the Hyatt with dracos 
[00:41.76]Hellcats they get off any scene the police chase those 
[00:44.82]Trolling a*s we shot your homie we ain't know he can take those 
[00:47.82]If I say your name don't post it opps be on all kind of s**t 
[00:50.79]Ain't got time to watch your page to see if n***as died or s**t 
[00:53.79]I know b***hes set you up literally n***as dying to hit 
[00:56.76]In this industry ain't what it seem this s**t be counterfeit 
[00:59.82]Ain't no lacking she say I'm a n***a from the trenches with a accent 
[01:03.90]Why you asking me who shot your homie why you asking 
[01:06.72]You got my number you post s**t on the gram you moving backwards 
[01:09.81]You lucky I don't be doing s**t for the gram you n***as cowards 
[01:12.15]Better not believe no rumors rest in peace to Koopa 
[01:15.18]I jumped on the school bus and I had brung a Ruger 
[01:18.12]Always drank an 8th of Act I never drunk a cooler 
[01:21.15]They get your location they might pop outside in Ubers 
[01:24.15]When his goofy a*s jumped in the streets 
[01:26.13]His a*s a hooper 
[01:26.97]I know this s**t don't matter I took a shower with a cougar 
[01:30.15]Bring him out retirement he gon' kill you for that moolah 
[01:33.09]Catch him in the morning wake him up that boy a rooster 
[01:35.85]Go 
[01:36.21]He took it to trial I tried to tell him it was stupid 
[01:38.79]I knew it 
[01:39.00]They gave him so much time his knees got weak and he was woozy 
[01:41.97]D**n 
[01:42.12]Watch the s**t you say the feds be listening to the music 
[01:44.94]Woah 
[01:45.06]And they gon' take your lyrics and build a case and try to use it 
[01:48.39]VA dropped my murder didn't have evidence to prove it 
[01:51.00]Nah 
[01:51.12]I think my house is haunted yeah by who 
[01:52.86]The ghost of Pookie 
[01:54.09]Woah 
[01:54.21]He ain't killed nobody but keep rapping about the shootings 
[01:57.03]P***y 
[01:57.12]Still ain't got revenge yet but keep making up excuses 
[01:59.94]Wow 
[02:00.15]Cuz done drank so much lean that his gut got big as Gucci's 
[02:02.88]Lean 
[02:03.12]Quit while he ahead and don't go out like Whitney Houston 
[02:05.73]Huh 
[02:06.12]He got caught without it now they robbing him for his rubies 
[02:09.03]Woah 
[02:09.27]He wouldn't give it up so he got buried in his cuban 
[02:11.82]It's Gucci 
[02:12.24]Better not believe no rumors rest in peace to Koopa 
[02:15.18]I jumped on the school bus and I had brung a Ruger 
[02:18.12]Always drank an 8th of Act I never drunk a cooler 
[02:21.21]They get your location they might pop outside in Ubers 
[02:24.06]When his goofy a*s jumped in the streets 
[02:26.13]His a*s a hooper 
[02:26.97]I know this s**t don't matter I took a shower with a cougar 
[02:30.15]Bring him out retirement he gon' kill you for that moolah 
[02:33.09]Catch him in the morning wake him up that boy a rooster
data.trans:
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:时间戳工具V2.0_20200810]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.15]Tay Keith 干掉这些家伙
[00:02.07]
[00:03.24]DJ Meech制作
[00:04.41]
[00:11.91]那些家伙找上了你们 你们都来招惹我 好像我并不是什么恶徒
[00:14.73]在博客上八卦 好像你们并不会先提到我的名字
[00:17.85]他是个*君子 他没有扣动他的扳机 他推卸说是药物的作用
[00:20.82]穿着同一件衬衫拍了段视频 还进行了枪战
[00:23.79]你知道怎么突然出现 来对准他们的脸射击吗
[00:26.85]他们喜欢Smurk那种 你这个蠢蛋 最好把你的案子放在首要位置
[00:29.70]谁勒死人了
[00:30.42]我听说了他们的流言 那些家伙最好慢慢来
[00:32.67]我不想要你给我抓个谁过来 我要我花钱雇佣的那个
[00:35.67]我们紧盯着他 他在亚特兰大 你知道他们会在那里呆多久
[00:38.79]酒店没有房间了 我们出去 拿上枪去凯悦酒店
[00:41.76]这群泼妇 无论怎样的犯罪现场她们都会逃走 警察会去追捕
[00:44.82]混蛋 我们射杀了你的兄弟 我们不知道他能不能承受
[00:47.82]如果我说出了你的名字 不要发到网上 我们的仇家都在虎视眈眈
[00:50.79]没时间守着你的主页 确认那些家伙是不是真的死了
[00:53.79]我知道那些女人陷害了你 说真的 那些家伙都很想揍你
[00:56.76]在这个行业 事实跟表面看上去不同 一切都是假的
[00:59.82]什么都不缺 她说 我是从混乱街区出来的带口音的家伙
[01:03.90]你为什么要来问我是谁杀了你兄弟 你为什么要问我
[01:06.72]你有我的电话号码 你在Instagram上发些垃圾信息 你一直在退缩
[01:09.81]算你走运 我不会搭理网上那些东西 你们这些胆小鬼
[01:12.15]最好不要相信谣言 安息吧 Koopa 
[01:15.18]我跳上校车 我带来了一把鲁格手枪
[01:18.12]总是在给自己灌酒 我从不会喝清凉饮料
[01:21.15]他们知道了你的位置 他们可能会开优步车去找你
[01:24.15]当他的地下商贩出现在街头
[01:26.13]他就会立马找上去
[01:26.97]我知道这不重要 我跟一个性感女孩一起洗了鸳鸯浴
[01:30.15]让他退休 他会为了钱杀掉你
[01:33.09]在早晨抓住他 叫醒他 那男孩是个懒鬼
[01:35.85]去吧
[01:36.21]他上了法庭 我尝试告诉他这很愚蠢
[01:38.79]我知道
[01:39.00]他们给了他那么多时间 他的膝盖开始发软 他很虚弱
[01:41.97]//
[01:42.12]注意你都说了什么不该说的 联邦调查员正听着音乐
[01:44.94]//
[01:45.06]他们会以你的歌词来立案 并且力图以此起诉你
[01:48.39]维吉尼亚州驳回了我的谋杀起诉 没有任何证明那是真的
[01:51.00]//
[01:51.12]我觉得我的房子闹鬼了
[01:52.86]Pookie的鬼魂
[01:54.09]//
[01:54.21]他谁也没有杀过 但一直在饶舌歌词里说自己拿枪射人
[01:57.03]//
[01:57.12]还没有复仇 但一直在编造借口
[01:59.94]//
[02:00.15]因为他喝了太多的酒 他的肚子变得跟古驰的包包一样大
[02:02.88]酒
[02:03.12]告诉他 让他在前进的时候放弃 不要像惠特尼·休斯顿那样离开
[02:05.73]//
[02:06.12]他毫无防备地被抓住了 现在他们在抢劫他的红宝石
[02:09.03]//
[02:09.27]他不会放弃 所以他被埋葬在了古巴
[02:11.82]这是古驰
[02:12.24]最好不要相信谣言 安息吧 Koopa
[02:15.18]我跳上校车 我带来了一把鲁格手枪
[02:18.12]总是在给自己灌酒 我从不会喝清凉饮料
[02:21.21]他们知道了你的位置 他们可能会开优步车去找你
[02:24.06]当他的地下商贩出现在街头
[02:26.13]他就会立马找上去
[02:26.97]我知道这不重要 我跟一个性感女孩一起洗了鸳鸯浴
[02:30.15]让他退休 他会为了钱杀掉你
[02:33.09]在早晨抓住他 叫醒他 那男孩是个懒鬼
